dashboard.title: Welcome to the Genomic Breeding Platform
dashboard.description: An integrated solution for cucumber genomic analysis and breeding optimization.

gp.title: Genomic Prediction (GP)
gp.description: Train GBLUP models and predict Genomic Estimated Breeding Values (GEBVs).

gwas.title: Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS)
gwas.description: Identify SNPs associated with specific traits using OLS or LMM.

mating.title: Genomic Mating Optimization
mating.description: Find optimal mating pairs to maximize genetic gain while managing diversity.

reports.title: Analysis Reports
reports.description: View and download reports from your analysis runs.
